2. 可用资源¶

2.1. ECS 资源类¶

ECS 资源类

参数

_client (alibaba.client.AlibabaCloudClient) -- Alibaba Cloud Client

参数

  • _client (alibaba.client.AlibabaCloudClient) -- Alibaba Cloud Client
